title: Do you want to write a letter of gratitude to your partner? - Quora

response.answer_text: I wish I could. But her deeds are entirely opposite of what needed to show gratitude towards her (lol!). In this era of emails and messengers, the people have also become virtual and have lost morality, respect and majorly common sense. Writing is the best way to showcase the feelings, though one can not see the emotion but can surely feel them. You can write as ‘long’ as you want and as much as you want. Also it showcases the worth of that person in your life, your love and affection towards them. It has it's own uniqueness and importance, especially in relationships. So if my partner is worthy enough, I would write not one but countless letter of gratitude. Cheers!!

I think it’s too early and also I am too new to write a letter of gratitude to my partner rather I would want him to feel good about every single moment of his life by my actions( gestures, love, and care for him).

I would rather like to write this letter in form of poem! This poem had been written on the day when we had a huge fight and it took days to get back to normal. Here I am shairing this in Image format!  Peace❤
